apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this diverse representation of affection features two people leaning in for a kiss, rendered with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and warm, realistic lighting. The smooth gradients highlight the gentle curves of their faces and the soft glow of their skin tones, creating a heartwarming and inclusive visual.  This emoji, designed with Apple's attention to detail, beautifully symbolizes romantic love, intimacy, and tender moments shared.
